#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,n,count[101][5]={0},i,j,save;
    char a[101][20];
    n=1;
    i=1;
    while(i<101){
               j=0;
               save=n;
               while(n){
                        if(n>=100){
                          n-=100;
                          a[i][j++]='c';
                          }
                        else if(n>=90){
                          n-=90;
                          a[i][j++]='x';
                          a[i][j++]='c';
                          }
                        else if(n>=50){
                          n-=50;
                          a[i][j++]='l';
                          }
                        else if(n>=40){
                          n-=40;
                          a[i][j++]='x';
                          a[i][j++]='l';
                          }
                        else if(n>=10){
                          n-=10;
                          a[i][j++]='x';
                          }
                        else if(n>=9){
                          n-=9;
                          a[i][j++]='i';
                          a[i][j++]='x';
                          }
                        else if(n>=5){
                          n-=5;
                          a[i][j++]='v';
                          }
                        else if(n>=4){
                          n-=4;
                          a[i][j++]='i';
                          a[i][j++]='v';
                          }
                        else if(n>=1){
                          n-=1;
                          a[i][j++]='i';
                          }
                  }
                  a[i][j]='\0';
                  count[i][0]=count[i-1][0];
                  count[i][1]=count[i-1][1];
                  count[i][2]=count[i-1][2];
                  count[i][3]=count[i-1][3];
                  count[i][4]=count[i-1][4];
                  for(j=0;a[i][j]!='\0';j++){
                     switch(a[i][j]){
                          case 'i':count[i][0]++;break;                                         
                          case 'v':count[i][1]++;break;
                          case 'x':count[i][2]++;break;
                          case 'l':count[i][3]++;break;
                          case 'c':count[i][4]++;break;                                   
                     }
                  }
                  i++;
                  n=save+1;
               }
    while(cin>>n&&n){
               cout<<count[n][0]<<" "<<count[n][1]<<" "
               <<count[n][2]<<" "<<count[n][3]<<" "<<count[n][4]<<" "
               <<endl;
               }
    return 0;
}
